title: Preamble of INDIAN CONSTITUTION
description: Lets dive into the essence of the Indian Constitution with a deep look at the Preamble! Understand how it sets the stage for our nations values and principles.

title: Part1: Of The Indian Constitution
description: Listen to what Article 1 , Article 2 and Article 3 says in short and crisp manner.

title: Part2: Of The Indian Constitution
description: What articles deal with citizenship? Learn them in crisp way.

title: Part3: Of The Indian Constitution
description: What rights do Indian Constituion offers?? Learn them in crisp manner.

title: Part4: Of The Indian Constitution
description: What are directive principles of state policies that provide a base for all policies of Gol.The expression of justice-social, economic and political, is to be achived by DPSP.

title: Part4A: Fundamental Duties
description: What duties a Indian citizen supposed to follow? Know all the 11 fundamental duties one by one along with it's history.

title: Part5: Of The Indian Constitution (Union , President , Supreme Court)
description: What is the part 5 of Indian constitution?What articles out of this are important and what they deal with? Know it with ease and with in a short span of time.....

title: Part6: Of The Indian Constitution (State Governors and High Courts)
description: Part 6 if Indian constitution talks about Governor, his powers and jurisdiction of high courts.

title: Part7: Of The Indian Constitution
description: Why there is no Part 7 in Indian Constitution?? Lets see the repealed Part7 and what was in it, in crisp manner....

title: Part8: Of The Indian Constitution
description: The Provides related to Union Territories of India. The special provision for Coorg state, which is now a common city..

title: Part9: Of The Indian Constitution (Local Governing bodies)
description: Part 9 is the one that contains all the provisions related to local governing bodies, i.e. Panchayats and Municipality. It is also about Cooperative societies.

title: Part10: Of The Indian Constitution
description: Hey! I am back with part 10 of Indian Constitution.Enjoy this and learn about it.

title: Part11: Of The Indian Constitution(Center and state relations)
description: This is part 11 highlighting some important articles of Part 11 which are related with Center and state relationships.How administrative and legislative powers are divided between the two.
